function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Flare ups of covid-19 continuing to plague humanity for several years","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of other zoonotic coronaviruses as a threat to humans","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through aerosols and surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with social distancing and hygiene measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adherence to lockdown measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to vaccination and herd immunity efforts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread and global reach of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in air cargo volume and shipping disruptions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to incorporate epidemiological considerations in building design","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of rethinking human movement patterns in commuter spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to change from the wider public","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate public engagement in discussing and embracing the required adjustment in house design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid fatigue leading to laissez-faire attitude and disregard for public health measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reversion to pre-pandemic behaviors and lifestyles without adequate preparedness for future pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and room design in communal facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High density of shoppers in supermarkets during a pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of resilience in newly built dwellings against pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of resilience in newly built dwellings against future pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fragility of the built environment in the face of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid deployment of pop-up facilities for community wide-spread nasal and throat swab testing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and compartmentalized spaces in communal facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hospitals designed without containment spaces for walk-in patients and visitors, without internal containment options between wards, and without containment options in emergency departments","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of design considerations for urban green spaces in the post-pandemic era","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate recreational spaces in public external spaces of apartment complexes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate aisle design for social distancing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate capacity for infectious disease and isolation wards","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collaborative learning without social distancing in classrooms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in school facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High-density layouts in supermarkets","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Confined classroom spaces with traditional desk layouts increase the risk of disease transmission and close contact between students.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Narrow and long shopping aisles in supermarkets can lead to congestion and increased close contact between shoppers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in open plan offices and schools","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in communal and private spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of early detection systems for sars-cov-2 in sewer networks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in large enclosed spaces such as open-plan offices and classrooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of fresh air inflow due to reluctance to provide windows that can be opened","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cross-floor contamination risk in elevator shafts","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential residence time of fine aerosols in elevator cabins","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited containment measures in communal spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate pressure differentials and air circulation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient containment space design","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to multiple bathrooms for majority of the population","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High probability of exposure in communal spaces of hotels and multi-residential complexes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of containment and insulation of private sphere from communal sphere","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of reticulated air with a mandated percentage of fresh air","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of separate air cycles for communal and private spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Designing spaces without consideration for self-isolation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of compartmentalization in building design","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Underestimation of future pandemic risks in architectural design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
